channel.title: Please help, new at this
channel.description:
ok, its my first server ever and i just got a shop maker. i add everything were its suposed to go (were it seys to)
before i add what it seys to add in the client its fine but after i add what it seys to add in the client this happens:
[code]client.java:17594: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PutNPCCords location: class client PutNPCCords = true; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
this is what the shop maker seys to do:
[code][Add under the '}' after 'WanneShop = 2;' in client.java] else if (NPCID == 0) { PutNPCCords = true; WanneShop = 30; } [/code]
what do i do now?

item.title: Please help, new at this
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

Change the PutNPCCords to PutNPCCoords

Read full topic

item.title: Please help, new at this
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

It’s so fucking hard to explain just make sure the ‘PutNPCCords’ that you added is exactly the same as the other ones in your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help, new at this
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

whaaaaaaaaaat???

Read full topic

item.title: Please help, new at this
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

Press ctrl+f and search ‘putnpccoords’. They copy the word ‘putnpccoords’ by using ctrl+c. Go back to what you added and replace ‘putnpccoords’ that you added with the one you copied.

Read full topic

item.description:

that always happend to me and i make a command with command make i pick it up nd pick up command from java did you know what i saw the too command is deferant that why thoose progream dont work
